column4: Why is it I'm unable to get ubuntu to poke me about upgrading my mom's computer? I've tried update-manager -p and update-manager -c
ah. normal releases vs LTS. gotcha
something about Ibex - the upgrade tool prompted me to try the new fast-user-switch-applet - I turned it down at the time, is there a way to rerun that?
including creating the guest account and whatnot?
Yes, let me find the command
cool. thnx
python /usr/share/gnome-panel/migrate-fusa-config.py
thanks again.
np
Just use vino, it's built in and dead simple to enable.
useless for headless
Ahh.
xtightvnc's server works btw.
but I wanted to get things working w/ xinetd
remmina and XDMCP also work - although insecure. unfortunately ubuntu doesn't package xqproxy yet
You should use ssh -X instead of -Y so that X11 traffic is encrypted also.
the X11 traffic is encrypted w/ both
is just trusted vs non
Sorry, misremembering I guess.
ssh -Y is needed also for a ton of gnome apps.
settled on manually starting xtightvnc server for now, and also using xqproxy/remina/XDMCP combo
BTW. gnome also screws up keymaps w/ xtightvnc, so is necessary to set XKL_XMODMAP_DISABLE=1
